#Text=Riots break out at Neo-Nazi rally in Toledo , Ohio
#Text=Sunday , October 16 , 2005
#Text=Calm has been restored after a Saturday rally held by members of the National Socialist Movement ( NSM ) in Toledo , Ohio .
#Text=led to a state of emergency being declared when riots ensued .
#Text=Fifty highway patrol officers were called in to support city police and to help control the crowd .
#Text=The unrest prompted the implementation of a city-wide 8 P.M. curfew .
#Text=The police force , which gave permission and protection to the neo-nazi group to hold the planned rally , claimed they were caught by surprise in the counter-protest that ensued .
#Text=Police resorted to tear gas to disperse the crowd of nearly 500 .
#Text=Over 60 demonstrators were arrested .
#Text=Opposition to the rally was mounted by concerned citizens and a coalition of political groups organized as an Anti-Racist Action group .
#Text=The actions of the counter-demontrators effectively ended the march just as it was getting started .
#Text=During the riot , several vehicles had their windows broken and one was set on fire at a gas station ; a local pub was looted and burned .

#Text=Toledo Mayor Jack Ford suggested that it was the NSM 's objective to incite violence , " Based on the intelligence we received , that 's exactly what they do â€” they come into town and get people riled up . "

#Text=Mayor Ford , an African-American , was puzzled as to why the NSM chose Toledo , and said of the rally location , " It is not a neighborhood where you have a lot of friction in the first place . "
#Text=About 20 members of the International Socialists Organization and the One People 's Project were present in opposition to the NSM rally .
#Text=The NSM has alleged these groups handed eggs to some African-American counter demonstrators .
#Text=The NSM bills itself as America 's Nazi Party and claims it was there to protest black gangs which , according to NSM spokesman Bill White , have been harassing white residents .
#Text=White also claimed that the NSM received support from community activists and citizens .

#Text=In a statement on the NSM 's website , White stated , " Well , what happened is that little groups of our supporters started to gather at the police barricades , as they tried to figure out how to get in .

#Text=In response to the NSM statements , the One People 's Project co-founder Daryle Lamont Jenkins said ,  Bill White has done this to us before .

#Text=In the past , he has written on his website that I and this organization orchestrated a rape , that I joined controversial communist organizations after being fired from a police force in New Jersey ( I never worked for a police force in New Jersey ) and even that I was soliciting nude photos of him !

#Text=Jenkins continued ,  In regards to what happened in Toledo on Saturday , we feel we should make our position clear .
